entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
